questionListItems.title: When will I receive the e-tickets?

answer.body: Successful applicants will receive their e-tickets within 2-3 working days. Please make sure to check your inbox and spam/junk folders for an email sent from ndp2023@klook.com. The e-tickets contain a QR code that grants entry and allows for NDP Pack redemption. It is important to note that the QR code can only be redeemed once, so sharing the e-tickets with multiple recipients is strongly discouraged.

questionListItems.title: How many tickets are available for the Heartland Festival locations?

answer.body: In consideration of the safety of public attendees, the number of tickets for each site will correspond with the respective site's capacity.

questionListItems.title: Can I pass my e-tickets to others if I cannot attend?

answer.body: Yes. Simply send them the e-ticket attached to the email. However, please exercise caution to ensure that the tickets are not misused. Please note that each e-ticket admits one person only, regardless of age (including infants carried in arms).

questionListItems.title: How do I know if my submission is successful?

answer.body: You will receive an email acknowledgment after you submit the form. However, please note that each applicant is allowed to submit only one application. The first submission will be considered final, regardless of location and day. Successful applicants will receive their e-tickets within 2-3 working days. Please ensure that you check your inbox and spam/junk folders for an email sent from ndp2023@klook.com.

questionListItems.title: How many SAFRA Clubs are giving out the tickets and which are these SAFRA Clubs?

answer.body: The list of SAFRA Clubs that are giving out the tickets can be found on the NDP website.

questionListItems.title: When can we hang the national flag?

answer.body:
Based on National Heritage Board website, the flag can be displayed from 1 July to 30 September annually. Kindly refer to the below link for more information.

https://www.nhb.gov.sg/what-we-do/our-work/community-engagement/education/resources/national-symbols/national-flag

questionListItems.title: What do I need to bring for ticket collection?

answer.body: Successful applicants must present the unique QR code included in their notification email to redeem their tickets. Please note that the QR code is valid for one-time use only and should not be shared with others to avoid any issues during the redemption process.

questionListItems.title: Where can I buy the tickets?

answer.body: GetActive! SG Heartland Festivals tickets are exclusively allocated through online application and physical distribution at various SAFRA Clubs. They are strictly NOT FOR SALE. Any attempts to sell the tickets will result in them being rendered void. Offenders will face appropriate actions.

questionListItems.title: I have lost/damaged my physical ticket. What should I do?

answer.body: It is the responsibility of successful applicants to ensure the safekeeping of their physical tickets, as lost or damaged tickets will not be replaced.

questionListItems.title: Can I pass my tickets to others if I cannot attend?

answer.body: Yes, you can pass your tickets to others if you are unable to attend the show. However, please exercise caution to ensure that the tickets are not misused. Please note that each e-ticket admits one person only, regardless of age (including infants carried in arms).

questionListItems.title: Where can I collect the physical tickets?

answer.body:
Limited physical tickets are available to cater to individuals who have difficulty applying for the e-ticket and can be collected at various SAFRA clubs. Click here to for more info.

  • ActiveSG Bedok Sport Centre: SAFRA Punggol and SAFRA Tampines

  • ActiveSG Jurong West Sport Centre: SAFRA Jurong

  • ActiveSG Toa Payoh Sport Centre: SAFRA Mount Faber and SAFRA Toa Payoh

  • ActiveSG Woodlands Sport Centre: SAFRA Choa Chu Kang and SAFRA Yishun

  • Our Tampines Hub: SAFRA Punggol and SAFRA Tampines

questionListItems.title: I was not able to get the tickets. Am I able to appeal?

answer.body: Unfortunately, no appeals are allowed. In addition to the GetActive! Singapore Heartland Festivals, there are various National Day-related activities that are open to the public. These activities include the fireworks display on 9 August 2023, which will be held at the five heartland sites. The Republic of Singapore Air Force will also perform the RSAF55 Island Flypast in the vicinity of the heartland sites.

questionListItems.title: Why am I unable to submit the form after filling it out, and why does it indicate that the form has closed?

answer.body: Tickets are allocated on a first-come-first-served basis. If you are unable to submit the form after filling it out and receive a message stating that the form has closed, it means that all available tickets have been allocated and no further entries are being accepted.

questionListItems.title: Why does it show that all tickets have been fully allocated when I visit the form?

answer.body: Tickets are allocated on a first-come-first-served basis. Once the form is closed, it indicates that all available tickets have been allocated.

questionListItems.title: Iâ€™ve submitted the form and received an email acknowledgement. Does it mean I will get the ticket?

answer.body: Yes, however, each applicant is allowed to submit only one application. The first submission will be considered final, and all subsequent entries, regardless of location and day, will be deemed invalid. Successful applicants will receive their e-tickets within 2-3 working days. Please ensure that you check your inbox and spam/junk folders for an email sent from mailto:ndp2023@klook.com
